channel.title: CVE Feed for HID Global -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HID Global -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-17492|2024-08-05T10:47:04.942Z -- hid%20global -- easylobby%20solo
item.description: EasyLobby Solo contains default administrative credentials. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain full access to the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-17491|2024-08-05T10:47:04.977Z -- hid%20global -- easylobby%20solo
item.description: EasyLobby Solo could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system. By visiting the kiosk and typing "esc" to exit the program, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthorized actions on the computer.

item.title: CVE-2018-17489|2024-08-05T10:47:04.999Z -- hid%20global -- easylobby%20solo
item.description: EasyLobby Solo could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of the social security number in plaintext. By visiting the kiosk and viewing the Visitor table of the database, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view stored social security numbers.

item.title: CVE-2018-17490|2024-08-05T10:47:04.877Z -- hid%20global -- easylobby%20solo
item.description: EasyLobby Solo is vulnerable to a denial of service. By visiting the kiosk and accessing the task manager, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to kill the process or launch new processes at will.

item.title: CVE-2024-23806|2024-02-07T16:23:16.889Z -- hid%20global -- hid%20iclass%20se%20reader%20configuration%20cards
item.description: Sensitive data can be extracted from HID iCLASS SE reader configuration cards. This could include credential and device administrator keys.
